department: Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions
short_summary: The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions Canada (OSFI) seeks to appoint a provider for the provision of Equifax Exignite: Economic Indicators (user licenses, historical and real-time data), with a subscription contract that starts after a Request for clarification (RFI) and includes an extension of a year, and be entitled to 455,349$ CAD (HST in addition.).
description: The provided data includes numerous keys with English and French values. The JSON to be created must preserve these values.
